name: Nightfall Hacker Demo
description:
Nightfall Hacker is an upcoming game in which you fight to gain control of nodes from out of control enemies in turn-based strategy battles. It was inspired by an old Lego game called The Nightfall Incident. The graphics look better in the executables than they do in the browser version. For development updates visit nightfallhacker.com

Icons made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com
